entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Shoal Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:22 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -23.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Shoal Lake 1:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -23.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -35
Dewpoint: -28.6°C
Wind: WNW 20 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Local blowing snow near noon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 23. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022
